name: Vollehovia-sex-determination
tagline: Supplementary data for Miyakawa and Mikheyev "Immunity to inbreeding in an ant: clonal reproduction stabilizes sex determination loci, facilitating biological invasion", to be deposited in DataDryad
body:
# Supplementary data for Miyakawa and Mikheyev "Immunity to inbreeding in an ant: clonal reproduction stabilizes sex determination loci, facilitating biological invasion", to be deposited in DataDryad

Image credit [AntWeb](http://www.antweb.org). Licensed under [CC BY 2.0](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/)

## assembly.fa.gz Newbler genome assembly ## samtools.vcf.gz Unfiltered variant calls from RAD-tag data. Samples IDs have three parts, separated by dashes. - The first part codes whether the sample is a male (SM or LM) or a worker (W). - The second part contains the colony numner - The third part is the individual id ## map.csv Filtered genotypes in r/qtl format. ## qtl mapping vollenhovia.pdf R script carrying out the QTL mapping analysis
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
